title: Once again Rito's balancing is f**ked
body:
I wonder when rito will fix their balancing team.It's so f**ked up.They always nerf the hard champs like {{champion:268}} and buff those easy champs like {{champion:122}} . Rito's balancing team used to be really good but now it's absolute bullshit.
Did rito hire anyone new to their balancing team or?????

Rip rek'sai and azir.They will be hardly played after all the nerfs.

We will be seeing so many godamn draven and darius players after the buffs.
